freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate:
reference H77_AF009606 feature-location precursor_polyprotein <#list rows as row> <#assign h77Start>${row["H77_START"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign h77End>${row["H77_END"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign pubmedID>${row[" Pubmed ID"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign epitopeName>${row["Epitope name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign epitopeID>${row[" Epitope ID"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign epitope>${row["Epitope"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign date>${row[" Date"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign method>${row[" Method/Technique"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign protein>${row["PROTEIN"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign stage>${row["Stage"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign genotype>${row["Genotype"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign measurement>${row[" Measurement of"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign effectorCellTissueType>${row[" Effector Cell Tissue Type"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign effectorCellType>${row[" Effector Cell Type"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign effectorCellCultureConditions>${row[" Effector Cell Culture Conditions"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign fullHla>${row["Full HLA"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign partialHla>${row["Partial HLA"]?trim}</#assign>
<#if h77Start != "" && h77End != ""> <#assign variationName>Epitope_${epitopeName?replace(" ", "_")}_${epitopeID}</#assign> create variation "${variationName}" -t AMINO_ACID "http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/${pubmedID}" variation "${variationName}" set pattern ${epitope} set location --labeledCodon ${h77Start} ${h77End} set field PUBMED_ID ${pubmedID} set field PUBLICATION_DATE_YEAR ${date} set field IS_EPITOPE true set field EPITOPE_IEDB_ID ${epitopeID} set field EPITOPE_METHOD "${method}" set field EPITOPE_PROTEIN ${protein} <#if stage != ""> set field EPITOPE_STAGE "${stage}" </#if> <#if genotype?matches("^[1-9][a-z]{0,2}$") > set field EPITOPE_GENOTYPE ${genotype[0]} <#if genotype?length gt 1 > set field EPITOPE_SUBTYPE ${genotype[1..]} </#if> </#if> <#if measurement != ""> set field EPITOPE_MEASUREMENT "${measurement}" </#if> <#if effectorCellTissueType != ""> set field EPITOPE_EFFECTOR_TISSUE_TYPE ${effectorCellTissueType} </#if> <#if effectorCellType != ""> set field EPITOPE_EFFECTOR_CELL_TYPE "${effectorCellType}" </#if> <#if effectorCellCultureConditions != ""> set field EPITOPE_EFFECTOR_CELL_CULTURE_CONDITION "${effectorCellCultureConditions}" </#if> <#if fullHla != ""> set field EPITOPE_FULL_HLA "${fullHla}" </#if> <#if partialHla != ""> set field EPITOPE_PARTIAL_HLA "${partialHla}" </#if> exit </#if> </#list> exit exit
